name: panora
description: Panora is a self-hosted unified inbox for customer support teams. It supports email and API-based integrations for consolidating and responding to support tickets and requests.
features: Unified inbox: Consolidate support tickets from multiple channels including email, chat, and API integrations into single interface
Multi-channel support: Connect various communication platforms to centralize customer interactions and streamline workflows
Ticket management: Organize, prioritize, and assign support requests with status tracking, tags, and custom workflows
Team collaboration: Internal notes, mentions, and ticket assignments enable seamless coordination among support members
Response templates: Create and use canned responses for common questions to reduce response time and maintain consistency
Customer history: View complete interaction history for each customer to provide context-aware support and personalized responses
API integrations: Connect with external tools and services through API endpoints to extend functionality and automate workflows
Search and filters: Quickly find specific tickets using powerful search and filtering by status, assignee, date, or custom criteria
Performance metrics: Track team performance with metrics on response times, resolution rates, and ticket volume
